0100100101101111 1011100111000110 1 -> sum: 0000001100110110, cout: 1
0000111010110000 1010011010010000 1 -> sum: 1011010101000001, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
